english.segment1: Light of the world. Are you still here?. And are we illuminating?. When love becomes a delicate display. So weak, dissolved by anything
english.segment2: Love lies here waiting all alone. Can a king be a king. Weighed down?
english.segment3: Our hearts, a bubble maker's dream. Moved on by winds of everything. As we deny that love is still the king. Not as weak as we make him out to be
english.segment4: Love lies here waiting all alone. Can a king be a king. Weighed down?
english.segment5: Weighed down. Weighed down. Weighed down. Weighed down
